attributes.action: Limit eligibility for selection as an MP
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Impose an eligibility requirement of a minimum of 5 years employment/self employment for prospective parliamentary hopefuls prior to selection. An applicant would be deemed ineligible for selection should he/she claim as their employer any of the following organisations -political think-tanks/lobbying groups/political, student organisations and trades unions (where the main employment is as a union official)in the 5 years prior to selection.
